Lacrosse
```{r}
library(dplyr)

set.seed(1234)

simulations <- rbinom(n = 1000, size = 1, prob = .377)

four_in_a_row <- mean(simulations == 1 & lead(simulations, 1) == 1 & lead(simulations, 2) == 1 & lead(simulations, 3) == 1)

odds <- 1/four_in_a_row
```
